text: Bundles to numbers Consider a bundle composed of two goods 1 and 2. Let x; denote the quantity of good i. Suppose that the consumer's preferences are represented by the function u(x1, x2) = 2In(x1) + 2In(x2) Suppose that we have two bundles with quantities {3,5} and {2,6}, how would this utility function rank them? u (3,5) =2In(3) +2In(5) = 5.42 Ð¸ (2,6) =2In(2) +2In(6) = 4.97 {3,5} is strictly preferred to {2,6}.
